Groundtruth:
import fitz
import PDFbf

# File-level information
filepath = "EF34GH.pdf"
doc = fitz.open(filepath)

# Annotation extractor
annoextractor = PDFbf.extractanno(doc=doc)

# Page-level and order-level information
pagenumber = 7  # Page 8 (0-based index)
rectangleorder = 3  # Fourth rectangle (0-based index)

# Extracting target rectangle
rectangle, rfpoint = annoextractor.getclip_rfpoint(pagenumber=pagenumber, rectangleorder=rectangleorder)

# Table content
argument = dict(
    clip=rectangle,
    data=[["Column", "Height"], ["C1", "3m"], ["C2", "4.5m"]],
    arrange=[[25, 20, 20], None]
)

# Adding the table
table_adder = PDFbf.manipulate_table(
    doc=doc,
    pagenumber=pagenumber,
    clip=argument.get("clip"),
    data=argument.get("data"),
    arrange=argument.get("arrange")
)
doc = table_adder.addtable()

# Save the updated file
updated_file = filepath[:-4] + "_updated.pdf"
doc.save(updated_file)
